Risk_Description: Personal data processed without lawful basis or transparency
Control / Mitigation: Define purpose+legal basis; provide notices; limit access

Risk_Description: Special category data handled without extra safeguards
Control / Mitigation: Classify data; stricter access controls; auditing

Risk_Description: Missing IP+port+timestamp logs breaks attribution and IR
Control / Mitigation: Standardize logging; time sync; retention policy

Risk_Description: Takedown / access-blocking decisions not handled on time
Unauthorized access/misuse leads to legal exposure
Evidence integrity breaks due to no hash/chain-of-custody
Weak proof of consent causes disputes
Control / Mitigation: Store consent logs; versioning; clear UX

Risk_Description: Misleading ads/spam creates legal & brand risk
Control / Mitigation: Approval workflow; consent-based marketing; claim verification

Risk_Description: Using unlicensed content or infringing trademarks/patents/designs
Control / Mitigation: License tracking; brand rules; takedown process
